title: Monitoring Locations

Monitoring Location Description.title: Monitoring Location Description
Monitoring Location Description.description: Text description of the monitoring location.

Tribal Land Indicator.title: Tribal Land Indicator
Tribal Land Indicator.description: Indicator denoting whether or not a location is on tribal land

Tribal Land Name.title: Tribal Land Name
Tribal Land Name.description: Name of American Indian or Alaskan Native area where the location exists

Alternate Monitoring Location ID.title: Alternate Monitoring Location ID
Alternate Monitoring Location ID.description: Alternate identifier used by other organization

Alternate Monitoring Location Context.title: Alternate Monitoring Location Context
Alternate Monitoring Location Context.description: Organization ID for alternate monitoring ID, required if Alternate Monitoring Location ID is reported.

Monitoring Location Source Map Scale.title: Monitoring Location Source Map Scale
Monitoring Location Source Map Scale.description: Integer representing distance on ground for one unit of measure on map or photo.  Required when Horizontal Collection Method Name is `Interpolation-Map`

Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value
Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy.description: The horizontal measure of the relative accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates

Monitoring LocationHorizontal Accuracy M.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Unit Code
Monitoring LocationHorizontal Accuracy M.description: Unit of measure of the relative accuracy, required if Monitoring Location Horizontal Accuracy Measure Value is reported.

Monitoring Location Horizontal Collectio.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Collection Method
Monitoring Location Horizontal Collectio.description: Method used to determine Lat/Long coordinates

Monitoring Location Horizontal Coordinat.title: Monitoring Location Horizontal Coordinate Reference System

Vertical Measure.title: Vertical Measure
Vertical Measure.description: The measure of elevation (i.e., the altitude), above or below a reference datum.

Vertical Unit.title: Vertical Unit
Vertical Unit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Vertical Measure is reported

Vertical Collection Method.title: Vertical Collection Method
Vertical Collection Method.description: The name that identifies the method used to collect the vertical measure of a reference point.  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

Vertical Coordinate Reference System.title: Vertical Coordinate Reference System
Vertical Coordinate Reference System.description: The name of the reference datum used to determine the vertical measure (i.e., the altitude).  Required if Vertical Measure is reported.

Monitoring Location Country Code.title: Monitoring Location Country Code
Monitoring Location Country Code.description: Code for Country,  recommended if state code is used not in (default) US.

Monitoring Location State.title: Monitoring Location State
Monitoring Location State.description: Postal abbreviation for Monitoring Locations's primary state, required if county code is reported

Monitoring Location County.title: Monitoring Location County
Monitoring Location County.description: FIPS code for Monitoring Location's primary county

Aquifer Name.title: Aquifer Name
Aquifer Name.description: Name of the aquifer in which the well is completed.

Well Formation Type.title: Well Formation Type
Well Formation Type.description: Name of the primary formation or soils unit, in which the well is completed.

Well Hole Depth Measure Value.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Value
Well Hole Depth Measure Value.description: Depth below land surface datum (LSD) to the bottom of the hole on completion of drilling.

Well Hole Depth Measure Unit.title: Well Hole Depth Measure Unit
Well Hole Depth Measure Unit.description: Unit of measure of the vertical measure, required if Well Hole Depth Measure Value is reported.

Monitoring Location Attachment File Name.title: Monitoring Location Attachment File Name
Monitoring Location Attachment File Name.description: The text describing the descriptive name used to represent the file, including file extension.

Monitoring Location Attachment Type.title: Monitoring Location Attachment Type
Monitoring Location Attachment Type.description: File text extension, free text not domain list validation.  Required if Monitoring Location Attachment File Name is reported.
